ComicInfo.Summary:
In the small town of Jericho, Texas, a yearly phenomenon known as the Jericho Lights brings tourists and UFO enthusiasts from miles around. Although the true cause of the strange dancing lights remains a mystery, they've become a deeply rooted part of Jericho's history. On the eve of this year's light show, something else returns to Jericho - 19 year old Zaya Vahn, who mysteriously vanished from the small town nearly 3 years ago. Heavily traumatized, it appears that Zaya has no memory of what happened to her. It soon becomes apparent that she may be keeping a few secrets which could blow open a sinister conspiracy stretching all the way back to the founding of Jericho.
